name: Web Ravine
description:
! Download the game for the best performance and stability !

! If you play on browser,  MAKE SURE YOU FULLSCREEN THE GAME !

In the middle of the night, a group of dragonflies attacked your ravine home. Ensure your survival as long as possible.

Use A and D to move.
Use W to jump.

Use S to drop from one web to another.

You must left-click twice to shoot a web. The first time you are clicking to choose where the web begins, the second time you are clicking to choose where the web ends.
